short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens an article in Nuggets to discuss with Nugg AI (ChatGPT), join the conversation and explore related high-quality writing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nuggets helps you dive deeper into topics that matter to you.

With a single click, our extension allows you to:
  - Join the conversation about the article or related topics in your Mastodon and Twitter networks
  - Discuss the article with Nugg AI (using ChatGPT)
  - Discover related, high-quality writing
  - Save the article to build your own Discover feeds for new reading recommendations

Nuggets is free, or $10/month for Discover feeds and more Nugg questions. Login in via Mastodon, Twitter, Google or Apple to start exploring.
